about_the_game:
Live in the heart of the Bermuda Triangle with all your Monkey friends! Swing on vines, throw doo at your enemies, and climb everything!
  • Huge Maps: Explore the Bermuda Jungle, Floating Forests, Ancient Ruins, Lava Chasm, and more

  • Unique Gamemodes: Be the first to collect 10 bananas or work together to fend off hordes of crocs -- new modes are coming all the time

  • Monkey Apparel: Customize your body color, equip face & head cosmetics, and stylize your doo

  • Themed Cosmetics & Hands-on Fun: Get your hands on... well, new Hand cosmetics! Plus, a bunch of wacky, interactive items like things you can eat, press, and shake to your heart's content.

  • Hidden Treasures: Dive into a revamped store experience and hunt for secrets - like a mysterious portal leading to a hidden market. Plus, uncover new secrets via the plane!




The Steam edition of Monkey Doo comes included with $20 worth of In-Game Currency: Rubies! All Steam players start out with rubies to spend on cosmetics, customization, and rewards.

Gamemodes


Banana Chase: Go Bananas for Victory! Dive into the original, wildly fun Banana Chase mode! Race against five other players to be the first to snag 10 bananas. Scour the map for those yellow treats and unleash your doo-throwing skills to knock bananas out of your rivals. It's a fast-paced, hilarious scramble to the top - perfect for those who love a blend of strategy and cheeky fun!

Horde Mode: Non-Stop Monkey Mayhem! Gear up for year-round fun with Horde Mode! Join forces with friends to fend off waves of hungry crocs. It's a teamwork test filled with adrenaline-pumping action, perfect for those who love a good cooperative challenge.

Survival Mode: Balloons, Poop, and Peril! Get ready to dodge flying doo in the new Survival Mode! It's like being in a Mario Kart balloon battle, but with a twist - monkeys are hurling doo at you! Keep your hearts safe and outlast the competition in this hilarious, high-stakes game of survival.

name: Monkey Doo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290
  • VR Support: Vive, Vive Pro, Index, Rift, Rift S, Quest, Quest 2, Quest 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Live in the heart of the Bermuda Triangle with all your Monkey friends! Swing on vines, throw doo at your enemies, and climb everything! A Variety of Playable Maps Multiple Gamemodes Customizable Cosmetics
